channel.title: Gamerz webpage v1
channel.description:
No pictures sorry
[b]Demo[/b] http://xtras.ulmb.com/gamerz/gamerz.html

item.title: Gamerz webpage v1

item.description:

get a better host

Any suggestions? Im using unlimitedMB and they’re quite nice
Have you tried getting google toolbar, that sometimes stops popups
[/quote]
Stopping the popups is not the issue. The fact that they exist the in first place shows that you are an incompetent moron.[/quote]
Well ive never gotten any popups so it never occured to me

item.title: Gamerz webpage v1
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:6, topic:312739”][quote author=cows_be_sacred link=topic=409179.msg3020195#msg3020195 date=1257540141]
Just a summary:
This is shit
[/quote]
stfu, and actually give some useful crit. instead of just flaming him. Although its true.

but tbh, it really needs work. The links at the top just plain out suck (default font, black on grey imo just doesn’t look good) and the assassin creed photo is out of the main content area. Like unhandled said, I saw the copyright at the side, etc. also, get a better host, I got spammed with pop-ups.

Also: Make sure your site works in all browsers.[/quote]
I didn’t get pop ups, but personally i don’t like the website, it’s boring, the colours don’t appeal.

Read full topic

item.title: Gamerz webpage v1
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:3, topic:312739”]Absolutely horrible.

Your images are loaded from an external image hosting site, why…?[/quote]
Because when i saw that i could put them into a image folder i already put the pictures into the CSS hosted by photoshop. If i thought of the image folder first i would have done it

Eventually ill get better
Ive only got the hang of editing html documents not creating from scratch.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2009, 08:33:12 pm[/size][hr]This is what i see

If you kindly tell me how to crop images right that would be appreciated

Read full topic

item.title: Gamerz webpage v1
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:3, topic:312739”]Absolutely horrible.

You have no font, Times New Roman is not a font, it is a default.
Your images are loaded from an external image hosting site, why…?
Your background images are appalling, background images are supposed to blend in, not make me want to vomit.
Why the fuck is there an assassin’s creed picture just sticking out of the left of the page, and yet another one with a white background in the middle of the page?
You are using absolute positioning for the above images, why the hell are you doing that?
When I resize my window, the images are on top of the content and are covering up the page.
You didn’t repeat the background on the header, and the text is part of the image. Disgusting.
The header doesn’t line up with the content, looks awful.
Your “copyright” is on the top right corner of the page.
Your “terms of service” doesn’t make any sense whatsoever, and moreover, you clearly stole those assassins creed images with no credit to their creators, why the fuck should anyone respect your wish for people not to steal your (shitty) work?
As of now, my browser has blocked 20 popup windows, I won’t even go into how absurd that is.

It’s too bad they closed geocities, because you could probably learn a thing or two about passable web design from them.[/quote]
Just a summary:
This is shit

Read full topic

item.title: Gamerz webpage v1
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Absolutely horrible.

You have no font, Times New Roman is not a font, it is a default.
Your images are loaded from an external image hosting site, why…?
Your background images are appalling, background images are supposed to blend in, not make me want to vomit.
Why the fuck is there an assassin’s creed picture just sticking out of the left of the page, and yet another one with a white background in the middle of the page?
You are using absolute positioning for the above images, why the hell are you doing that?
When I resize my window, the images are on top of the content and are covering up the page.
You didn’t repeat the background on the header, and the text is part of the image. Disgusting.
The header doesn’t line up with the content, looks awful.
Your “copyright” is on the top right corner of the page.
Your “terms of service” doesn’t make any sense whatsoever, and moreover, you clearly stole those assassins creed images with no credit to their creators, why the fuck should anyone respect your wish for people not to steal your (shitty) work?
As of now, my browser has blocked 20 popup windows, I won’t even go into how absurd that is.

It’s too bad they closed geocities, because you could probably learn a thing or two about passable web design from them.

Read full topic
